title: The New Pornographers Return With A 'Celebration Record' That's Fun To Figure Out
teaser: Brill Bruisers is a collection of lushly arranged and harmonized pop. While Neko Case, Dan Bejar and A.C. Newman make moody music individually, there's a brightness when they come together.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
